ARABIC: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do not set up another god together with Allah. Truly I bring you a clear warning from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not set up another god with God. I give you a clear warning from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and do not set up any deity with Allah. Surely I am a clear warner to you from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do not choose other gods besides Him. I have been sent from Him to plainly warn you".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And do not appoint other deities along with Allah; indeed I am from Him, a clear Herald of Warning towards you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And set not up any other god along with Allah. Verily, I am a plain warner to you from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And do not set up with Allah another god: surely I am a plain warner to you from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And set not up with God another god; I am a clear warner from Him to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And set not any other god along with Allah; lo! I am a plain warner unto you from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do not set up another god, along with God. I come from Him to warn you plainly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And set not up another god with Allah; verily I am Unto you from Him a warner manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do not set up another god besides Allah. Indeed I am from Him a manifest warner to you.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And make not another an object of worship with Allah: I am from Him a Warner to you, clear and open!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And set not up (or worship) any other ilahan (god) along with Allah [Glorified be He (Alone), Exalted above all that they associate as partners with Him]. Verily, I (Muhammad SAW) am a plain warner to you from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not set up with Allah another god. I am a clear warner to you from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “And do not set up any other god with God. I am to you from Him a clear warner.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:51] And do not set up another god alongside God. Truly I am a clear warner to you from Him (before fa-firrū, ‘so flee’, one may read an implicit [preceding] qul lahum, ‘Say to them’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And set not any other god along with Allah) refrain from saying: Allah has a son or partner; (lo! I am a plain warner) in a language you understand (unto you from Him) from Allah.
